articles.summary: (Credit: Stephanie Wissel / Penn State) Penn State scientists using balloon-mounted cosmic particle detectors to analyze radio waves from cosmic rays on the remote continent of Antarctica report the anomalous detection of strange radio pulses that seem to originate from below the ice.
